tidbits.title: Gross National Happiness
tidbits.description: Bhutan measures its success by Gross National Happiness (GNH), prioritizing the well-being and happiness of its citizens over material wealth.

tidbits.title: Breathtaking Landscapes
tidbits.description: Bhutan is known for its pristine landscapes, including the majestic Himalayas, ancient monasteries like Paro Taktsang (Tiger's Nest), and serene valleys.

tidbits.title: Cultural Preservation
tidbits.description: Bhutan holds a strong commitment to preserving its unique culture and traditions, seen in its vibrant festivals, traditional dress (kira and gho), and architecture.
